original: Årholm, Simon Johannes, tandläkare, Varberg, f. 20/1/97 i Uddevalla. G. 31 m. tandl. Hedvig Eriksson. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 18, tandl :kand. 28, tandläk. 31. Aman. v. tandl :inst. tand-kir. avd. 30, v. dess tandfylln :avd. s. å., assist, v. samma avd. 31, assist, i Kristianstad 31-32, praktik i Varberg sed. 32. Ordf. i Varbergs sportskyt-tekl. sed. 40, v. ordf. i Varbergs skyt-tefören. Medl. av Frimurarorden. Hobby: jakt. Statens mäsit :märke i mauserskjutn. o. riksmed. i S 40, Gm i olymp, kortdis t :skjutn.
translated: Årholm, Simon Johannes, dentist, Varberg, born on January 20, 1897, in Uddevalla. Married on March 31, with dentist Hedvig Eriksson. - High school graduate in Gothenburg in 1918, dental candidate in 1928, dentist in 1931. Assistant at the dental institute's dental surgery department in 1930, in the same department's dental filling department the same year, assistant in Kristianstad from 1931-1932, and practice in Varberg since 1932. Chairman of Varberg's sports shooting club since 1940, vice chairman of Varberg's shooting association. Member of the Freemasons. Hobby: hunting. Awarded the State's marksmanship badge in Mauser shooting and national medal in Sweden in 1940. Married in Olympic short-distance shooting.

awards.name: State's Marksmanship Badge in Mauser Shooting
